FAQs

aka, never before asked questions

What should I wear?

“Look chic” - Charles Eardley, 2025

In reality, please wear whatever you’re most comfortable in. Amelia is wearing red. Let loose kids.

What will I eat?

Part one attendees, we’ll reach out to you for dietaries.

Part two folks, we recommend you also have a delicious lunch before joining us at the pub. For local places to eat, check out our pins on Google Maps (other establishments are available).

At The Alpaca we’ll be ordering a selection of sharing plates. There’ll also be the option to order any additional food as your bellies desire.

What will your surnames be?

We’ll be following the ancient tradition of combining surnames. We will be taking the first half of Oakley and the second half of Eardley to make Oakley.

A gift???

We really do genuinely honestly mean it - there really is no need! If you really would like to do something, please donate to this pot. We will use half for a silly little Italian roadtrip/honeymoon, and half will go to our chosen charities of The RNLI, and Gendered Intelligence

(PS, this is just my bank account so please add a note so we know who to say thank you to!).
